casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Richard W. BERNARDI, Sr. and Strategic Environmental Partners, LLC, Defendants-Movants. M-523/524 September Term 2018
081879 Supreme Court of New Jersey. January 25, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for an extension of time within which to file a motion for leave to appeal (M-523) is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal (M-524) is denied.
